-config tools/uniquification/inputs/ip_template.config.txt

-autosearch src
### We highly recommend using the auto-generated file list, as it knows to avoid fuse files.
#-filelist tools/uniquification/inputs/ip_template.rtl.filelist.autogenerated.txt

-uniquify_ace_config
### If -uniquify_ace_config does not work, uncomment the line below.
### It will be pre-populated by the clusterize script with *.udf and *.hdl files located anywhere in $MODEL_ROOT, except for fuse files. 
#-ace_file_list tools/uniquification/inputs/ip_template.ace.filelist.txt

-uniquify_rdl
### If -uniquify_rdl_config does not work, uncomment the line below.
### It will be pre-populated by the clusterize script with *.rdl files found in $MODEL_ROOT/tools/srdl, except for fuse files
#-rdl_filelist tools/uniquification/inputs/ip_template.rdl.filelist.txt

-uniquify_lintra_waivers
### If -uniquify_lintra_waivers does not work, uncomment the line below.
### It will be pre-populated by the clusterize script with *._w.xml files found in $MODEL_ROOT/tools/lint
#-lintra_waivers_filelist tools/uniquification/inputs/ip_template.lintra.filelist.txt

-uniquify_collage
### Enable the below switches if they apply to your design.
#-uniquify_febe
#-uniquify_visa_config

-rtl_scope tools/uniquification/inputs/ip_template.scope_names.txt
-rtl_libs tools/uniquification/inputs/ip_template.library_names.txt
